entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
